item.title: Interview with Rosalie Burel (presenter #6, twitter thread!)
item.description: some quote Rosalie Bruel works in environmental research. She missed our session on lightening talks and will soon head to Vermont. So she wrote a Twitter thread on her work in environmental research. She has also used a recur twitter handle. Cette semaine j'anime le compte de @laBioauLabo.
